childCompilations.description: Whether closure-compiler should run during child compilations

deps.description: Path to a Closure-Library deps file

extraDeps.description: A map of name to path of additional closure-library style dependencies

mode.description: Methodology used to bundle assets in a chunk

chunkFilename.description: The filename of non-entry chunks as relative path inside the `output.path` directory.

filename.description: The filename of non-entry chunks as relative path inside the `output.path` directory.

platform.description: Version of closure-compiler used. May be an array of preference order

entryChunks.description: Chunks regarded as entry chunks, will not be wrapped by webpackJsonp
